sql.if:
<#list table.columns as column>
and t.${column.sqlName}=<@map '${classNameFirstLower}.${column.columnNameFirstLower}, jdbcType=${column.mybatisSqlTypeName}'/>
</#list>

mapper.update:
update ${sqlName} t set t.update_time=now() <#list table.columns as column> <#if !column.pk>
,t.${column.sqlName}=<@map '${column.columnNameFirstLower}, jdbcType=${column.mybatisSqlTypeName}'/>
</#if> </#list> where t.${table.onePKColums.sqlName} = <@map '${table.onePKColums.columnNameFirstLower}, jdbcType=${table.onePKColums.mybatisSqlTypeName}'/>
mapper.select: select t.${table.onePKColums.sqlName}<#list table.columns as column><#if !column.pk>, t.${column.sqlName}</#if></#list> from ${sqlName} t where t.${table.onePKColums.sqlName} = <@map '${table.onePKColums.columnNameFirstLower}, jdbcType=${table.onePKColums.mybatisSqlTypeName}'/>

select t.${table.onePKColums.sqlName}<#list table.columns as column><#if !column.pk>, t.${column.sqlName}</#if></#list> from ${sqlName} t where 1=1
limit <@map 'startIndex'/>,<@map 'pageSize'/>
select t.${table.onePKColums.sqlName}<#list table.columns as column><#if !column.pk>, t.${column.sqlName}</#if></#list> from ${sqlName} t where 1=1
